name: Tunes Attack ! Lite
description:
Tunes Attack! : Play 3 RHYTHM GAMES with your IPOD LIBRARY !

♬ BEAT ALL YOUR TUNES!
Play with your Own Music, directly from your iPod Library! Games are Generated by Your Music in Real-Time, you can play with Any Song!

♬ 3 RHYTHM GAMES IN 1
Play the Classic Rhythm game (TAP TAP like), but also a Scooter DRIVING game, and a Space SHOOTER! Of course, all in rhythm with your music!

♬ ONLINE SCOREBOARD
Perform all the most popular worldwide hits and challenge the WORLD, on each song and each game!

♬ AMAZING STORYLINE
Save the world from Tunes Attack in the Career Mode designed with graphic novel, and defeat the FINAL BOSS!

♬ 2 PLAYERS MODE
Challenge your friends on the same device!

♬ Multi-Lingual
- English
- Français
- 日本語

♬ Other Features
- High 3D graphics and sound quality
- Dynamic lighting and physics
- Facebook connection
- 4 Eclectic Sound Tracks to download
- Easy music transfer through Wi-Fi
- Direct import from iPod Library (iOS4 only)

♬ Available in the Lite Version
- Single Player modes
- First chapter of Career Mode
- 3 of your own Songs



♬ Game Manual

Gameplays :
- Scooter : drive the scooter by sliding horizontally your finger on bottom of screen, the scooter go in front of your finger.
- Concert : tap with your 2 thumbs in circles when notes passes through.
- Space : drive the ship by sliding in any direction your finger on bottom of screen, the ship go in front of your finger.

Options :
- Start Speed : sets the difficulty. Higher the value is, higher the speed of the game is and more elements are generated.
- Speed Auto
Yes : game difficulty raises when you use a boost, and lowers when you run out of lives.
No : difficulty is fixed, if you run out of lives, you lose.
- Musical Effects
Yes : the music speeds up when you use a boost, and slows down when you lose a life.
No : the music isn’t altered by the game events.
